mapper.select:
select detect_boundary_info.create_time, detect_boundary_info.direction, detect_boundary_info.end_miles, detect_boundary_info.id, detect_boundary_info.is_delete, detect_boundary_info.line_id, detect_boundary_info.long_chain, detect_boundary_info.operate_status, detect_boundary_info.operator, detect_boundary_info.remark, detect_boundary_info.start_miles, detect_boundary_info.status, detect_boundary_info.track_dis_category, detect_boundary_info.track_type, detect_boundary_info.update_time, detect_boundary_info.workshop_id form detect_boundary_info
